page.title: 06Victorian Houses
page.content: Eight children conducted a survey of Victorian Houses in our part of the block. The streets we surveyed were Lathom Road, Avondale Road, Leyland Road and Gordon Street. We found that the houses could be divided into four main catagories: a)Guest Houses, b)Nursing Homes, c)Flats (Private or Holiday), d)Private Dwellings. There were 34 Guest Houses, 84 Flats, 12 Nursing Homes and 88 Private Dwellings, a total of 218 houses. Many people come to Southport for their holiday and stay in the Guest Houses or Holiday Flats. There are also many Nursing Homes in the town to cater for the older people who retire here. Victorian Houses are very large and most suitable for this type of accomodation. This interesting survey showed us something about our ancestors.
